metadata.title: Claude Code Repos Index
metadata.description: Curated index of Claude Code-related resources and projects

categories.name: Agent Systems & Multi-Agent Workflows
categories.description: Multi-agent systems, agent networks, and orchestration tools

repositories.name: Claude Code Writing Squad
repositories.description: Multi-agent writing system designed to iteratively process and refine text through specialized editing agents, including typo review, UK English standardization, flow improvement, heading creation, proofreading, source addition, and SEO optimization.

repositories.name: Claude Sub-Agent Network
repositories.description: Collection of ready-to-use system prompts and configurations for various development, operational, and creative tasks, organized into prompts-only and frontmatter-enhanced formats for multi-agent development workflows.

categories.name: Configuration & Context Management
categories.description: CLAUDE.md templates, context tools, and configuration managers

repositories.name: Claude Code Context Toolkit
repositories.description: Implements the CONTEXT.md workflow system bridging human-friendly context documentation with AI-optimized briefings through slash commands and specialized agents for managing, converting, and synchronizing project context between narrative CONTEXT.md files and structured CLAUDE.md briefings.

repositories.name: Claude Code Repo Managers ClaudeMD
repositories.description: Pre-configured CLAUDE.md templates providing context-aware instructions for managing different repository types including Hugging Face projects, GitHub repositories, and collaborative workspaces.

repositories.name: CONTEXT.md
repositories.description: Workflow methodology for preparing project context in human-friendly markdown files that can be converted into agent-specific configuration files, separating casual human-authored CONTEXT.md scratchpads from structured CLAUDE.md briefings for AI agents.

repositories.name: Linux Desktop ClaudeMD Seeder
repositories.description: Automatically generates and deploys contextual CLAUDE.md files across a Linux desktop filesystem to improve Claude Code's understanding of directory structures and workflows.

repositories.name: Private And Public Claude MD
repositories.description: Tools for managing both public CLAUDE.md and private CLAUDE_PRIVATE.md configuration files with security-focused git configuration to prevent accidental exposure of sensitive information.

repositories.name: Claude Code Linux Notes
repositories.description: Personal documentation repository containing practical workflows, configurations, and tips for using Claude Code on Ubuntu with KDE Plasma, covering Linux-specific integration, system automation, and real-world usage patterns.

repositories.name: Cool Claude Code Stuff
repositories.description: Curated collection of Claude Code projects, tools, and resources organized by category including account management, ACP integration, actions, agent managers, API providers, automation tools, and autonomy enhancers.

repositories.name: Non-Code Claude Code
repositories.description: Showcase of creative applications of Claude Code beyond traditional software development, including deep research, writing, learning, and finance use cases.

categories.name: MCP & Integrations
categories.description: MCP servers, integrations, and command generators

repositories.name: Claude Code MCP Command Generator
repositories.description: Generator for creating MCP commands for use with Claude Code.

repositories.name: Claude Code MCP List
repositories.description: Curated index of Model Context Protocol servers organized into 14+ categories including AI model integration, memory management, code analysis, development tools, browser automation, and workflow automation for extending Claude Code capabilities.

repositories.name: Smithery Claude Code MCP Jumpstarter
repositories.description: Curated collection of 35+ MCP servers across 15+ categories with interactive installer for streamlining installation and configuration, including essentials bundle for core functionality.

categories.name: Security & System Administration
categories.description: Security tools, audit systems, and admin utilities

repositories.name: Claude Code Security Auditor
repositories.description: Comprehensive system for managing and auditing security configurations across multiple machines, performing systematic security checks including antivirus status, rootkits, file permissions, and network exposure.

repositories.name: Claude Code Linux Desktop Slash Commands
repositories.description: System administration and configuration slash commands specifically designed for Linux desktop environments.

repositories.name: Claude Slash Commands
repositories.description: General-purpose slash command library for various Claude Code workflows and tasks.

categories.name: System Management & Automation
categories.description: System tools, automation scripts, and management utilities

repositories.name: Bash Alias Manager Claude
repositories.description: Claude Code-powered tool for systematic management of bash aliases with features for adding, editing, deleting, researching, and backing up aliases with automatic YADM synchronization.

repositories.name: Claude Code LAN Manager
repositories.description: Tools and resources for using Claude Code to manage local servers and home lab environments.

repositories.name: Claude Conda Manager
repositories.description: Specialized Claude Code workspace for managing and optimizing Conda environments on Ubuntu workstations with AMD ROCm hardware, designed to maintain efficient AI/ML development environments through systematic documentation and version control.

repositories.name: Claude Github Shortlister
repositories.description: Template repository that helps developers systematically evaluate and shortlist GitHub repositories using Claude Code for automated analysis with structured workflow for repository collection, requirements definition, and AI-powered recommendations organized by star count, update date, and relevance.

repositories.name: Claude Is Awesome
repositories.description: Template for streamlining creation of curated resource lists featuring automated formatting, alphabetization, and badge generation through custom slash commands to help users focus on meaningful curation rather than formatting tasks.

repositories.name: Claude Linux Desktop Manager
repositories.description: AI-powered system administration interface wrapping Claude Code CLI with a graphical interface for executing Linux desktop management tasks, integrating an extensive library of slash commands for system configuration, diagnostics, hardware benchmarking, security auditing, and network operations.

repositories.name: Claude OS Sync Agent
repositories.description: Intelligent synchronization tool for maintaining consistency between desktop and laptop using Claude CLI for context-aware decisions about packages, configurations, and tools with hardware-aware installation recommendations.

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.description: Items that don't fit other categories

repositories.name: Claude Code Context Feature Requests
repositories.description: Feature requests and suggestions for improving Claude Code's context handling capabilities.
